name: Just Kidding
description:
Seems like our little stand up comedian has a real problem connecting setups and punchlines all by himself.  So, dive in his head and help him out! You may say it's impossible, but I'm telling you: it's just unreal.

Control with WASD or arrow keys.

Space bar to restart or move to the next level.

Escape to escape.

All credits are in the credits. Everything else is made by me.

Made in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
